changeSet.author: ShawnDeng
changeSet.comment: 创建工作台-节点分享设置表
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}node_share_setting` ( `id` bigint(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `node_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '节点ID', `share_id` varchar(64) NULL COMMENT '分享唯一ID', `is_enabled` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '可分享状态(0:关闭,1:开启)', `allow_save` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '是否允许他人转存(0:否,1:是)', `create_time` timestamp(0) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) COMMENT '创建时间', `update_time` timestamp(0) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `k_node_id`(`node_id`) COMMENT '节点ID唯一' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='工作台-节点分享设置表';

changeSet.author: ShawnDeng
changeSet.comment: 创建工作台-节点分享设置操作记录表
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}node_share_operate` ( `id` bigint(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `share_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '节点分享唯一编码', `operate_event` tinyint(2) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '操作事件类型(0:开启分享,1:关闭分享,2:开启转存,3:关闭转存,4:刷新链接)', `operator` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '操作者', `create_time` timestamp(0) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT = '工作台-节点分享设置操作记录表';

changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}node_desc` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `node_id` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '自定义节点ID', `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT '节点描述', `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `update_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE KEY `uk_node_id` (`node_id`) USING BTREE COMMENT '节点唯一编码' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='工作台-节点描述表';

changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.comment: 创建空间公开邀请链接表
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}space_invite_link` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `space_id` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '空间ID(关联#vika_space#space_id)', `team_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '部门ID(关联#vika_unit_team#id)', `creator` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '创建者成员ID(关联#vika_unit_member#id)', `invite_token` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '邀请令牌编码', `invite_num` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '成功受邀人数', `is_deleted` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除标记(0:否,1:是)', `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `update_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE KEY `invite_token` (`invite_token`) USING BTREE COMMENT '唯一性令牌' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='工作空间-公开邀请链接';

changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}audit_invite_record` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `space_id` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '[冗余]空间ID(关联#vika_space#space_id)', `inviter` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '邀请者成员ID(关联#vika_unit_member#id)', `accepter` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '受邀者成员ID(关联#vika_unit_member#id)', `type` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '受邀类型(0:邮箱邀请;1:文件导入;2:链接邀请)', `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='审计-邀请记录';
